website_summaries.verdict: Wooden soles and natural leather make this clog choice both unique and classic.
pros: Nail heads keep these clogs sturdy
Good quality traditional clogs with wooden soles
Natural variations in the handmade shoes make every pair unique
cons: The sizing on these clogs is not standard
Designed to slip while you walk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM. I've owned a zillion clogs over the years. These are really well made and the nail heads are much nicer looking than the usual staples. I've been wearing them for about a month and they are comfortable and I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JGrey

customer_reviews.title: I have always love to wear clogs
customer_reviews.text: I am nurse , I have always love to wear clogs. I appreciate honest expectation, I have been wearing around house before using to work. So far leather starts soften, because it is tight , I need wider wigth, using thin socks help for going to work. Hope to soften more but it is very comfortable even without socks. This is very good brand for clog. I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my clogs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these even more than I thought I would. They are snug fitting which is great. Im wearing them with either no socks or very thin socks. I ordered my exact size. The color is so bright and pretty! Love the wooden bottoms and the stubs for design! Picture shows an owl on the sides...mine do not have that though. Definitely recommend and I am thinking of getting another pair in another color!!
customer_reviews.author: Karissy Marie

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second attempt at buying these clogs, initially I used the company's fitting guide, went by their recommendations & then couldn't get my feet into them! (I have broad feet) Very disappointing! So I then went 2 sizes up & broke them in as the instructions suggested. Now I love them, I'm not sure yet how close to the end my toes are but I don't really care. I have to consciously make sure my feet are in them in the right place, I can't just walk into them but they are worth every bit of it, I love them!!!! Thank you so very much for a wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anam Cara  Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made clog
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made clog and I love the color in olive. The button trim around the sole instead of staples is very attractive. The shoe is easy to walk in (although I wouldn't try to walk long distances in any clog) and great for around the house and casual walking.
customer_reviews.author: Sammicatcat

customer_reviews.title: they are making me so happy.. May even usurp my obsession w/ my ...
customer_reviews.text: Podiatrist advised wooden soled clogs for my aching feet... Enter Sandgrens, they are making me so happy.. May even usurp my obsession w/ my Dansko's.. As an NP I spend my entire day on my feet, thanks for making that easier for me Sandgrens clogs..
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Buddha

customer_reviews.title: High arch?  Size up generously especially if you’re a half size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up because I know from experience with closed back clogs in my size I couldn’t fit due to having a high arch. Once again the size 10 fit like a 9 US and I felt and my toe was at the end of the shoe even though I had issues again with having a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: I miss wearing real quality wooden clogs.
customer_reviews.text: I grew up wearing good quality European wooden clogs. It has been years since I've had a pair and I am thrilled with the purchase. They are so nice looking, feel great on my feet (true to fit using size chart), and the added rubber on the bottom adds a nice cushion when walking. If I was to mention a downside it would be the longer cut on the inner right clog, this is something that can happen when they are handmade, I get that. I feel that section when standing or walking, though it isn't a real bothersome issue. I would purchase again and am saving up for my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: C. Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: These are really beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice looking and I love the color and studs. Since they are my first wooden clogs since the seventies, i am following the instructions on wearing them indoors for a few hours. So far they have been ideal and i am sure they will be ready for more hours and the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Avis Pitkow

customer_reviews.title: Sigh..... Loved these shoes!  Wanted to hate them
customer_reviews.text: I was buying shoe inserts for high arches and castor oil, sounds exciting.... I got this pop up for Sandgrens and they reminded me of clogs i had when I was younger. Wanted to have a reason to send them back but I loved them and kept them.... just a classic clog, and if you like clogs you will like this shoe. Comfortable but not an all day shoe unless you really break them in.
customer_reviews.author: butchiesmom

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly small
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 40 for my wife based on the sizing chart and was slightly too small. Returned that pair and re-ordered a size 41 which fit her perfect. She says they’re a little stiff now but understands they’ll soften up over time as used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clogs, reminds me of the 70s!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly and were just as picture. I probably should have ordered a 36 instead of a 35 to get the fit of my clogs from high school but I used the instructions and it looked like I needed a 35. That say, I thought they were comfortable from the start and wore them for about 5 hours the first day and had no problems. I am hoping to order more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Brick

customer_reviews.title: These are well made clogs, but they run small
customer_reviews.text: I love the oiled leather material and the brass tacks but they run small. I normally wear a 6 1/2-7 but I ordered a 38 and I have no extra room if I want to wear thicker socks. I'm hoping that the leather stretches with wear so I can wear socks for warmth when the weather gets colder.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kosoglou

customer_reviews.title: If you have used clogs before, you will love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoes! They’re super comfortable, and look very nice. I measure my feet and ordered a 38. They fit exactly right, just to the end of my heel. Next time I might order a size up. I have very narrow feet, if you have wide feet, definitely order a size up. Overall, love them, I used them the whole day for t he first time, no need to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Laura E. Miro

customer_reviews.title: I'm tickled
customer_reviews.text: I use the method described and had paper marked from my feet while standing. Took the measurements and matched the size from their chart. They fit perfectly after the recommended break in procedure. They look great, they re comfortable to wear and the quality is top notch. I'm tickled.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B Gilroy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but allow your feet to get used to them as the enclosed instruction tells you. Sandra
customer_reviews.text: These are stylish and also, they are recommended by my podiatrist for my 2 fractured metatarsal bones. The sole is rigid and the clog stays on over mr instep so they don’t slip off at all! Love them, I’ll wear them well past the healing is done! Sandra
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shors
customer_reviews.text: I have worn clogs for45 years. I love the nails over staples. These are very comfortable and I will definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: ddskmmr

customer_reviews.title: Ouch !
customer_reviews.text: Well made but very hard and torturous to try to walk in them. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A.

customer_reviews.title: High quality good price Expensive look
customer_reviews.text: Special events with particular clothing and they look expensive as made to be
customer_reviews.author: Karen Beard-Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Super stylish and heel height is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super stylish, And the heel height is perfect. They do need breaking in. Perfect to wear out for a casual dinner with jeans.
customer_reviews.author: D. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest clogs I have ever seen. Well made. Love the added rubber bottom for traction & noise reduction.
customer_reviews.author: B. Skrodzki

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic shoes, feel great and cute as can be! I can wear them with jeans, or work clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted but not for me
customer_reviews.text: I sized up one size based on other reviews. Still way too tight and uncomfortable. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Guest

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sandgrens clogs!
customer_reviews.text: The clogs are gorgeous. They seem designed just for my feet! They actually relieve my footpain. They look dressy so I enjoy wearing them with my jeans and cardigans.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my clogs. These will be my go to slip on summer time shoe.
customer_reviews.author: katymom

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up for best fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up from my normal shoe size, they fit perfect, a little snug but they will need to get worked in. Love the colour/style...I've already used horsehair brush and nubuck water repellant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort . Ive always loved cloggs.
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was the right size,but it took a lot of break in to make them feel comfortable. I had to use two moist towels inserted into each shoe to "mold" them. I was able to wear them to work today and they felt just right.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen , LMFT

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: They are high quality and comfortable. I do need to follow the break in instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Carpentier

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: The fit of the Mule. Never tried this type of shoe. Very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the ​product was too stiff and hard.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B.

customer_reviews.title: Not quite right.
customer_reviews.text: These look cool, but are very stiff and run super small.
customer_reviews.author: M. Katharine Grantz

customer_reviews.title: ... size 8 in these shoes and they were more like a 7
customer_reviews.text: Purchased size 8 in these shoes and they were more like a 7. The shoes were really good quality clogs.
customer_reviews.author: Robin E. NC

customer_reviews.title: Great clogs!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and comfortable. I love the dark green color and stud detailing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: snug fit will wear in
customer_reviews.text: these are amazingly comfortable and looks great too...exactly what i'd expected from a good pair of clogs...thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Deciding how your gonna wear them. With or without socks.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I might have ordered a size a bit to big but if I wear socks with them they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Farra

customer_reviews.title: Great classic clog
customer_reviews.text: Classic clog of the 70’s- I love them all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Azra

customer_reviews.title: I love my clogs
customer_reviews.text: I love my clogs! They are beautiful, great quality, material and color! It is worth the money. I used the size chart and followed the recommendation of adding 1/8-1/4 inch (0.3-0.7 cm) to the base length measurement and they fit perfectly. They are very comfortable, I walked with them for hours and felt great! I have clogs from different brands and these are definitely the best ones!
customer_reviews.author: gisela milman

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these clogs
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these clogs! Quality craftsmanship & style! They are comfortable from the start-the leather relaxes with wear.The red for Christmas are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Holly C

customer_reviews.title: beautifully made and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Received clogs. These were my second pair. They were as expected, beautifully made and fits perfectly! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Capri K.

customer_reviews.title: I returned
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I wanted but really looks good. If the price was cheaper I would have kept but for the price I wanted a perfect fit. I will say they are Much better looking in person.
customer_reviews.author: LAPD

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful and well made clogs
customer_reviews.text: The olive color is beautiful. The clogs are well made and comfortable. I've only been wearing them for 3 days but can already feel the beautiful leather softening up. They are worth the money. Excellent craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Saoirse2019

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Just love them, just the right size and heel height. Very well made. Thanks!! Lori
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfort and width
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of clogs I have owned. I have slightly narrow feet and wear size 10 (40) shoes. Usually, when I look for clogs, they are too wide and clunky. Not these. They are very stylish and fit extremely well. Amazingly comfortable too. I will definitely buy another pair in the future. Can highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is definitely there!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn clogs in the past and after many years I thought I would try them again. They are everything I remember. Comfortable, well made and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne bates

customer_reviews.title: Better in person
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made clog! Stunningly fashionable. It runs one size small but I have wide feet so one size up fit great! Love it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sona Strenger

customer_reviews.title: Measure your foot, do not go by US or EU sizing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clogs and the fit is perfect! However, use the actual measurements for your feet to size properly (the bottom half of their sizing instructions). If I went by the US or EU sizing it would have been way too large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wasn't true to size
customer_reviews.text: These clogs look amazing but they were probably two sizes to small.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Senske

product_meta.title: Sandgrens Swedish Handmade Wooden Clog Mule| Athens
feature_bullets: Comfortable wooden clogs made of natural materials.
We know, sizing can be tricky sometimes. That is why we created our very own size guide to help you find your Sandgrens size. Scroll down to Product Description and follow the instructions.
If you’re looking for more information about our materials and how to care for them, please scroll down to Product Description and you’ll find all the information you need.
We craft all clogs by hand in our factory in Sweden.

This color is NUBUCK leather – a leather similar to suede with its soft and velvety touch, although nubuck is known to be more durable. Please note these clogs are not for use in areas where they will come in direct contact with an excessive amount of water, oils, or corrosive chemicals.
